name: Lucifer's Lift
description:
Take demons to the floor they want.

Check the mini map to see which floor the demons are queuing up.

Controls:

  • Use the mouse wheel to move
  • Left Mouse button to open the doors

You will Die if too many demons are waiting on a floor or if you don't get the demon to the floor in enough time.

Art by Pomerane Games

Code and design by Return To Adventure Mountain.

To get a free copy of a game and stay up to date with my latest games, be sure to subscribe to my mailing list.
